title: MC原版音效文件放在哪里。
author: jojang
txt_content:
如题 :(
我只想搞个音mad

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
打开 .minecraft\assets\indexes\1.14.json

搜索 ogg，比如 "minecraft/sounds/ambient/cave/cave1.ogg": {"hash": "29d4dccf3353334c7aa2a49cb6fed3780a51a1ba", "size": 33948}, 

复制其中的 29d4dccf3353334c7aa2a49cb6fed3780a51a1ba 到 .minecraft\assets\objects 中搜索，然后改下后缀就是了

replies.author: jojang
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-5-16 14:32
打开 .minecraft\assets\indexes\1.14.json

搜索 ogg，比如 "minecraft/sounds/ambient/cave/cave1.ogg":  ...
秒回还行
